document_data.name: Copy
document_data.mainbody: '''''Copy''''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[evocation]] spell that allowed the caster to make a perfect copy of a letter, map, or other such document.
document_data.Effects: The magic of the spell activated when the caster held a blank piece of parchment over the document to be copied. Each casting of this spell could ''copy'' up to ten standard size pages. ''Copy'' could not be used on magical writings of any kind.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s a blank piece of parchment [[paper]] and a drop of [[ink]] to cast.
document_data.History: The ''copy'' spell was allowed to be used within the Great Library of the [[House of the Moon]] in [[Waterdeep]].
